RESOLUTION:

We had an incorrect assertion for TKS-4.

When we swap !zeroForOne, positive liquidity delta should be added and we check for overflow.
If the liquidity delta is negative we should subtract and check for underflow.

Call sequence:

    swap(0,1270594466,false,false) Time delay: 1 seconds Block delay: 23
    swap(3590428578332706300051398292905,285409508591334242614530,false,false)
